name: Ninja Duels
description:
Note: This is a GMS project, so the download is kinda complicated.

Go grab a friend (if you have one, that is) and jump into the game! As ninjas, you can throw shuriken at each other, and the first to get 0 health loses! Claim victory as the best ninja ever!

P1 (Red): Arrows to move, [Space] to shoot

P2 (Blue): WAD to move, [E] to shoot
